OAIAPI
Table of Contents

OAIAPI - Fine Tuning Capability

Namespace

Promezio.OAIAPI.Capabilities.FineTuning

Summary

The FineTuning class provides methods to interact with the Fine Tuning capability of the OpenAI API, facilitating the creation, listing, retrieval, and cancellation of fine-tuning jobs for machine learning models.

Examples

Properties

Constructor Parameters

  • apikey: The API key for authentication.
  • logger: The Logger instance used for logging operations. You can read more about the logger here.

Methods

Create Fine-Tuning Job

Task Create(string trainingFileID, string modelName, decimal? batch_size = null, decimal? learning_rate_multiplier = null, decimal? n_epochs = null, string? suffix = null, string? validationFileID = null): Creates a fine-tuning job for a machine learning model with specified parameters. List Fine-Tuning Jobs

Task<FineTuningObject[]?> ListJobs(): Lists all fine-tuning jobs. List Events for a Fine-Tuning Job

Task<FineTuningEvent[]?> ListEvents(string jobID): Lists events associated with a specific fine-tuning job. Retrieve Fine-Tuning Job Details

Task<FineTuningObject?> Retrieve(string jobID): Retrieves details of a specific fine-tuning job. Cancel Fine-Tuning Job

Task<FineTuningObject?> Cancel(string jobID): Cancels a specific fine-tuning job.
